message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a mutually beneficial deal. I'm willing to start with an initial offer of $900000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the initial offer I made. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $800000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm thinking of $875000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $875000. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I can only go up to $825000. I believe this is the highest I can go and still make a reasonable profit. I hope we can meet in the middle.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $825000. I'm going to have to be firm on my price, and I'm thinking of $900000. This is the minimum I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value. I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we may not be able to come to an agreement.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $900000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I can only go up to $850000. I believe this is the highest I can go and still make a reasonable profit. I hope we can come to an agreement.
